author: Comicstorian
description:
Absolute Batman Issues 1 - 14 by Scott Snyder. Batman faces Black Mask, meets Alfred, gets captured by Mr. Freeze, and tortured by Bane in The Zoo, Absolute Zero, & The Abomination.

Next Issue - https://youtu.be/8zxg96Zw-3c

Want to Keep This Channel Going? http://www.patreon.com/comicstorian
Want Our Full Stories on Spotify?! https://open.spotify.com/show/5QC49HKr5xoOytidIgfi3Y?si=2630b0588d1e4a39
Enjoy some Gamersupps with our code! https://www.gamersupps.com/comics

What Is Comicstorian? Comicstorian is a channel that covers Comic Book content, both new and old. We dramatically read stories, very similar to audiobooks, but for Comics! You can get videos here every Monday, Wednesday, and Friday. Wednesday will always have a brand new comic that came out that day! Originally, Benny was The Comicstorian, but passed away unexpectedly 6/8/2024, and so his Best Friend and long-time business partner, Dan, has taken up the mantle to read in his stead.

Some of Our Most Popular Playlists!
title: Absolute Batman Full Story
